00021 #define BUFFER_WIDTH    64
00022 #define BUFFER_HEIGHT   64
00023 
00024 //function to draw picture on both screen, when a form is recognize
00025 static void DrawWhatIsKnown(Form What); 
00026 //function to draw rectangle arround the form known
00027 static UInt8 DrawRect (Rect Rectangle,const GraphicBuffer *Target);     
00028 
00029 
00030 UInt8 LCD_Left_Buffer [BUFFER_WIDTH*BUFFER_HEIGHT*BYTES];  // array to store the left lcd screen, one byte per pixel
00031 UInt8 LCD_Right_Buffer [BUFFER_WIDTH*BUFFER_HEIGHT*BITS];  // array to store the right lcd screen one bit per pixel.
00032 
00033 GraphicBuffer LCD_Left ;  // left graphic buffer 
00034 GraphicBuffer LCD_Right ; // right graphic buffer 
00035 UInt8 X_Pic=5,Y_Pic=5;    // x,y to draw pictures of form known on the right LCD screen         
00036 
00037 int main (void)
00038 {       
00039         Int16 i=0,j=0,k=0,tmp=0;
00040         
00041         // LCD Buffer
00042         UInt8 LCD_Buffer[BUFFER_WIDTH*2*BUFFER_HEIGHT*BITS]; 
00043         // Number of form 
00044         Int16 Nb_Identify=0 ;   
00045         // List of forms
00046         Form  ListOfForm[MAX_OF_FORM];  
00047         // RGB Frame of camera
00048         RGBFrame FrameFromCam ;
00049 
00050         //Initialize POB-EYE and LCD Screen
00051         InitPOBEYE();
00052         InitLCD();
00053                         
00054         // Init Left and Right screens buffer
00055         InitGraphicBuffer( &LCD_Left,BUFFER_WIDTH,BUFFER_HEIGHT,EIGHT_BITS,LCD_Left_Buffer);
00056         InitGraphicBuffer( &LCD_Right,BUFFER_WIDTH,BUFFER_HEIGHT,ONE_BIT,LCD_Right_Buffer);
00057 
00058         // Clear the Left and Right screen
00059         ClearGraphicBuffer(&LCD_Left); 
00060         ClearGraphicBuffer(&LCD_Right);
00061         
00062         // Get the pointer of the red,green and blue video buffer 
00063         GetPointerOnRGBFrame(&FrameFromCam);
00064 
00065         while(1)
00066         {
00067                 // Init the x,y of the first picture
00068                 X_Pic=8;
00069                 Y_Pic=8;
00070                 
00071                 // draw a frame in right buffer
00072                 DrawBitmap(0,0,IDB_7_FRAME,bitmap,&LCD_Right);                  
00073 
00074                 // Grab the RGB components
00075                 GrabRGBFrame();                         
00076                 
00077                 // Binary the three RGB Buffer
00078                 BinaryRGBFrame(&FrameFromCam); 
00079 
00080                 // draw red component in left buffer
00081                 DrawComponentInABufferVideo(FrameFromCam.red, &LCD_Left );
00082 
00083                 // try to identify the forms and make a list of it.
00084                 Nb_Identify=IdentifyForm(&FrameFromCam,ListOfForm,pattern);     
00085                 
00086                 // Parse the list of the form
00087                 for(i=0;i<Nb_Identify;i++)
00088                         DrawWhatIsKnown(ListOfForm[i]);
00089         
00090                 // Draw the twis LCDs screens
00091                 DrawLeftLCD(&LCD_Left);         //the left for the real time video
00092                 DrawRightLCD(&LCD_Right);       //the right for the result
00093         }
00094         return 0;
00095 }
00096

00098 
00099 void DrawWhatIsKnown (Form What)
00100 {
00101         Rect Target;
00102         
00103         // draw the frame
00104         DrawBitmap(X_Pic,Y_Pic,IDB_8_LITTLE_FRAME,bitmap,&LCD_Right);   
00105         
00106         // the picture of what is known in the frame
00107         DrawBitmap(X_Pic+3,Y_Pic+3,What.id -1,bitmap,&LCD_Right); 
00108          
00109         //manage the (x,y) To draw the next known form on the right lcd screen
00110         X_Pic+=28;
00111         if((X_Pic+28)>BUFFER_WIDTH)
00112         {
00113                 Y_Pic+=26;
00114                 X_Pic=8;
00115         }
00116 
00117         // draw a rectangle arround the known form on the left lcd screen
00118         
00119         Target.x=What.x - (What.width/2);               // manage the upper left corner of the form
00120         Target.y=What.y - (What.height/2);              
00121         Target.width=What.width;
00122         Target.height=What.height;
00123         
00124         DrawRect(Target,&LCD_Left);                     // Draw the rectangle arround the form known.
00125 }

00129 
00130 UInt8 DrawRect (Rect Rectangle,const GraphicBuffer *Target)
00131 {
00132         UInt8 i=0,X=0,Y=0,W=2,H=2;
00133         UInt16 tmp=0,SizeOfBuffer=0;
00134         
00135         SizeOfBuffer=Target->width*Target->height;
00136 
00137         /*******************************************************************/
00138         /* we have to manage a ratio between the video buffer of the frame        */
00139         /* from the cam (88*120 pixels), and the LCD screen (64*64 pixels)          */
00140         /*******************************************************************/
00141 
00142         X=(Rectangle.x*186)>>8;
00143         Y=(Rectangle.y*135)>>8;
00144         W+=((Rectangle.width)*186)>>8;
00145         H+=((Rectangle.height)*135)>>8;
00146         
00147 
00148         //draw the 2 horizontals lines
00149         for (i=0;i<W;i++)
00150         {
00151                 tmp=X+Y*Target->width+i;  
00152                 if (tmp>(SizeOfBuffer)) return 0;
00153                 Target->buffer[tmp]=0xFF;
00154 
00155                 tmp+=H*Target->width;   
00156                 if (tmp>(SizeOfBuffer)) return 0;
00157                 Target->buffer[tmp]=0xFF;
00158         }
00159 
00160         //draw the 2 verticals lines 
00161         for (i=0;i<H;i++)
00162         {
00163                 tmp=X;
00164                 tmp+=((i+Y)*Target->width);
00165                 if (tmp>(SizeOfBuffer)) return 0;
00166                 Target->buffer[tmp]=0xFF;
00167 
00168                 tmp+=W;
00169                 if (tmp>(SizeOfBuffer)) return 0;
00170                 Target->buffer[tmp]=0xFF;
00171         }
00172         
00173         /****************************************************************/
00174         /* Drawing Horizontal line or vertical with a "for" instruction */
00175         /* it's more faster than using the DrawLine function            */
00176         /****************************************************************/
00177 
00178         return 1;
00179 }
